name: SafeSun
0:
”Alexa, open safe sun”
”Alexa, start safe sun”
”Alexa, load safe sun”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safe sun
des:
The Skill "Safe Sun" informs current and maximum UV indexes of a City that you want to know.

>> Disclaimer notes:

The information in this Skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. 
Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

>> Usage:

To start the skill, you can say one of the following phrases:
- "Alexa, open Safe Sun"
- "Alexa, start Safe Sun."
- "Alexa, load Safe Sun."

>> Other actions allowed by the Skill:

- You can stop the Skill anytime just by saying "Stop" or "Cancel"
- If you want to repeat the last information, just say "Repeat"
- To request help, say "Help"

>> Technical information:

UV index data is obtained from a service that uses information from the following sources:

- Royal Netherlands Meteorological Institute (KNMI)
- National Institute of Water and Atmospheric Research (NIWA) of New Zealand

UV general protection tips were obtained from EPA (United States Environmental Protection Agency) and FDA (U.S Food and Drug Administration) web sites.

>> Support:
If you have any questions or need help with the Skill, send an email with your question to alexa.suporte@techimagem.com.br"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
